channel.title: Posts on Taiwanese Tech in TO
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Taiwanese Tech in TO

item.title: About Me
item.description: Introducing myself as a Java back-end developer ready to join a great team in Canada.

item.title: My Interview Journey in Toronto
item.description: I’m currently job hunting in Toronto and excited to share my ongoing interview experience with Affirm. Here’s a look at my process so far, including key moments and the steps ahead.

item.title: 台灣人必看！Ether.fi Card 實測：LINE Pay 綁定教學與限時 10% 回饋攻略（附獨家連結）
item.description: 專為台灣用戶解析 Ether.fi Card 如何綁定 LINE Pay，讓您的 eETH/weETH 資產無縫用於日常消費。掌握常態 3% 回饋與最新的 10% 限時活動細節，透過我的推薦連結申辦還能享專屬福利！

item.title: My First Month in UofT
item.description: Discover how UofT School of Continuing Studies’ English for Effective Communication course helped a newcomer adapt to Toronto, make friends, and enjoy student benefits. Read my experience and reflections!
